actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution reinforcing the United States-Senegal relationship and urging the Government of Senegal to conduct free, fair, transparent, and inclusive elections on February 25, 2024.

summary.text: This resolution expresses the commitment of the United States to democracy, democratic governance, and free elections in Senegal. The resolution encourages all the people of Senegal to exercise their right to vote and calls upon Senegal to ensure that citizens can vote freely and safely in elections without fear of intimidation.

titles.title: A resolution reinforcing the United States-Senegal relationship and urging the Government of Senegal to conduct free, fair, transparent, and inclusive elections on February 25, 2024.
